Text:
All the good Japanese stuff is censored:(  
When it isn't, it starts looking like a run of the mill
Vivid style video from the US. The Japs know how to keep porn interesting, and the chicks are usually hot.
Yeah, it's a shame that they censor the good parts.  That reason alone is probably why they are so fucked up sexuality-wise.
Don't ya love how the Japs will censor out a guys dick, but let you see his jizz splatter all over a chicks face? A bit backwards, I think...
The Japanese have to censor their porn. It was mandated by the americans after WWII.
